newsitem.title: USA: Marcus raises goal to 500 new movie screens.
newsitem.headline: Marcus raises goal to 500 new movie screens.

text.p: Marcus Theatres Corp, a unit of Marcus Corp, said Tuesday it raised its goal for opening new movie screens to 500 by the year 2000.
Two years ago, the company announced plans to double the size of its circuit to 400 screens from 200 by 2000. It now operates 297 screens.

"After a 32 percent expansion in our screen count last year, which was the largest in company history and the second highest growth rate among the top 40 theatre circuits in the country, we're confidently raising our goal," said Bruce Olson, president of Marcus Theatres.
